articles.title: Safari users at heightened risk from new fullscreen BitM attack
articles.description: New research reveals Safari users face heightened risk from advanced Fullscreen Browser-in-the-Middle attacks due to unfixable API flaws undetected by current security tools.

articles.title: Electronic tattoo gauges mental strain
articles.description: Researchers gave participants face tattoos that can track when their brain is working too hard. The study introduces a non-permanent wireless forehead e-tattoo that decodes brainwaves to measure mental strain without bulky headgear. This technology may help track the mental workload of workers like air traffic controllers and truck drivers, whose lapses in focus can have serious consequences.

articles.title: Brad Marchand boils over in third period and pays the price with game misconduct
articles.description: NHL News: During Game 1 of the playoff series between the Florida Panthers and Carolina Hurricanes, Brad Marchand was ejected after a fight with Shayne Gostisbe

articles.title: Pokemon GO Reveals Eggs-pedition Access Details for June
articles.description: Pokemon GO unveils the full details of its upcoming Eggs-pedition Access in June, which lets players receive extra Incubators and bonuses.

articles.title: Mozilla releases Firefox 139.0.1 update to fix artifacts on Nvidia GPUs
articles.description: Mozilla has rolled out an emergency Firefox 139.0.1 update after the Tuesday release caused graphical artifacts on PCs with NVIDIA GPUs.

articles.title: Microsoft Authenticator now warns to export passwords before July cutoff
articles.description: The Microsoft Authenticator app is now issuing notifications warning that the password autofill feature is being deprecated in July, suggesting users move to Microsoft Edge instead.
